meanings.definition: A group of items packaged together for sale as a single unit.
meanings.sent1: I bought a multipack of snacks for our road trip.
meanings.sent2: The store sells multipacks of soda cans for parties.
meanings.sent3: The multipack of markers saved the day during the art class.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a multipack of joy, spreading happiness everywhere.
meanings.sent5: The multipack of colored pencils made drawing more fun and colorful.

meanings.definition: To package items together in a group for sale as a single unit.
meanings.sent1: The company will multipack the candies before shipping them out.
meanings.sent2: We need to multipack the products before sending them to the stores.
meanings.sent3: She decided to multipack the gifts in colorful wrapping paper.
meanings.sent4: His words seemed to multipack emotions, leaving everyone touched.
meanings.sent5: The team will multipack the supplies for the upcoming event.
